properties.short_desc: Off-duty officer was punched and kicked severely by "an individual of superior strength and size." The officer shot and killed the assailant with a handgun.
Off-duty officer died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
Various police departments were conducting surveillance. Suspect was hit and injured in a firefight.
Suspect stabbed someone and attacked officers with a knife. Officers shot and killed the suspect. They also shot and injured a bystander.
Police officers shot a suspect as he drove toward them. The suspect drove away, injured. The suspect was later arrested and taken to hospital.
Suspect stabbed a police officer. Another officer shot and killed the suspect.
During a traffic stop, a suspect fired and hit an officer with a handgun. The officer shot and injured the suspect.
An officer died from a self-inflicted gunshot.
Suspect "almost ran down" a police officer while fleeing another police agency. The officer shot and injured the suspect.
Suspect was threatening officers and bystanders with a knife. An officer shot and killed the suspect.
Officers tried to stop a car that had been driving recklessly. The driver pinned an officer with their car; officers then shot and killed the driver.
Suspect crashed their car after a high-speed pursuit. The driver pinned an officer against a wall with their vehicle; the officer shot and killed the driver.
Officers responded to call about a "mentally disturbed person." The suspect tried to stab officers. The officers shot and injured the suspect.
Officer injured themselves by unintentionally firing their gun while leaving Lake Merced pistol range.
Police sniper covering a mayoral event was shot in the hand while passing a weapon to a colleague.
After a short chase, suspect driving a stolen vehicle attempted to run over a police officer. The officer shot and killed the driver.
A dog was attacking a child. Officers shot at the dog several times, and one round struck an officer.
Officer fired on a suspect during a traffic stop. The suspect fled, injured, and was later arrested.
Suspect attempted to kidnap a woman, then shot at police during a pursuit. Several officers shot and killed the suspect.
Suspect escaped during an attempted arrest. After a car pursuit, the suspect exchanged fire with officers, and was shot and killed.
A parolee pointed a gun at officers; the gun misfired. An officer shot and injured the parolee.
Man "matching the description" of robbery suspect approached by officer. The suspect "displayed a knife in a threatening manner," after which the officer shot and wounded him.
Officer shot himself getting out of his car. He was injured.
Parolee attempted to flee in a car, knocking an officer to the ground. Another office shot and injured the parolee.
Off-duty inspector died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound at his home
Suspect fled in car when officers attempted to serve warrant. The suspect drove "directly at" an officer, who shot and wounded the suspect.
Officers tried to stop a vehicle, which drove off. Occupants then fled on foot, and one passenger pointed a rifle at officers. Officers fired at and injured the suspect.
Off-duty officer returned to his car and found a suspect inside. The suspect met the officer with "resistance and furtive movement." The officer shot and wounded the suspect.
Officers saw a firearm, leading them to pursue a vehicle. On Treasure Island, suspects in the vehicle did not surrender and drove at police. Officers shot and injured two suspects.

Officers responded to a call about squatters in Park Merced Complex. Suspect was concealing himself in an attic. The suspect made "threats and furtive movements." Officers incorrectly thought he had a gun; officers shot and killed him.

Two officers approached a car that had been reported stolen and was allegedly used for drug dealing. Officers drew their guns; the driver started the car and pinned an officer. Both officers shot and killed the suspect.
properties.address: Capp St. between 15th St. and 16th St.

properties.short_desc: Officers responded to shots fired. Suspect fired upon officers; one officer shot and killed the suspect. Two murder victims were later found in a car, presumed to be killed by the suspect.
Officers responded to a call about a gun. Officers shot and killed a suspect holding a replica gun.
Two officers pursued a suspect wanted for robbery and weapons offences. The suspect shot and killed an officer. Officers returned fire. The suspect shot and killed himself.
Restaurant manager called police to remove a "troublesome patron." The suspect tried to fire a gun at officers. Officers shot and killed the suspect.

Suspect was trying to assault occupants of a parked vehicle with two kitchen knives. When officers intervened, the suspect "rapidly approached" them. The officers shot and killed the suspect (who was later found to have murdered someone a block away).
Off-duty officer unintentionally discharged his gun at his San Mateo home and died.
Officers tried to take an "aggressive panhandler" into custody for outstanding warrants. The suspect fled then produced a knife and "advanced on the officers." An officer shot and killed the suspect.
properties.address: Lombard St. and Van Ness Ave.

properties.short_desc: Off-duty officer shot and injured himself while holstering his weapon during a camping trip.
Social worker called police to help with a "mentally disordered" individual. She "confronted the officers with a knife." Officers shot and injured her.
Suspect broke into a house with a pry bar. The suspect knocked an officer down the stairs. An officer shot and injured the suspect.
Officers were assisting with crowd control after a shooting. A suspect was firing a gun in the area. When he pointed his pistol at officers, the officers shot and injured him.
Officer stopped a car for expired registration. The car drove away. The officer shot at the car; the suspect fled and was not captured.

Suspect was threatening others with a cleaver, according to his landlord. Officers used "less-lethal" rounds but they were ineffective. When the suspect "attacked officers with the cleaver," an officer shot and killed him.
A "mentally disturbed person" was breaking windows with a flashlight. The subject was armed with a knife. An officer shot and injured them.
Off-duty sergeant died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
Officer was confronted by "a suspect armed with a machete." The officer shot and killed the suspect.
Officer at Mission Station accidentally shot himself in the hand while reassembling his gun.
Suspect fled a traffic stop, reversing into an unmarked police car. The officer shot and injured the driver.
Occupants tried to investigate a parked vehicle. The vehicle drove at an officer; the officer shot at the driver, who fled.
Plainclothes officers saw someone fire a pistol into a crowd of people. They gave chase and fired upon him. They missed, but the suspect was arrested.
Officer pursued a car wanted in relation to a carjacking. She fired upon the suspects but missed; the suspects escaped.
Plainclothes officers confronted several suspects. One fired a pistol at the officers, and the officers returned fire. No-one was hit; several suspects were arrested.
Off-duty officer found dead with a single self-inflicted gunshot wound at his home.
Officer responded to a noise-complaint. The occupant of the address "gained possession of a firearm during the confrontation." The officer shot and killed the occupant.
Suspect refused to leave his vehicle during a traffic stop. Narcotics were found and the suspect tried to drive away; an officer fired but there were no injuries.
Off-duty officer died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound in Los Altos.
Officer began to be dragged by a car. Another officer shot at the car. There were no injuries; the suspect turned himself in several days later.
Officers confronted several individuals for violating "park regulations." One person "physically attacked" an officer; the officer shot and injured them.
Officers responded to a report of a stabbing. Two officers were "confronted" by a suspect with a knife. The officers shot and killed the suspect.
Officers called to arrest a "mentally disturbed" suspect in a wheelchair. The suspect was holding a knife. One officer was stabbed; two opened fire and injured the suspect.
Officers saw a suspected bank robber in a parked stolen car. The suspect "used his vehicle as a weapon" as he pulled out. Two officers shot at the car and killed the suspect.
Suspect fired a handgun at the officers. Two officers fired back. The suspect was struck and injured.
Suspect detained in relation to MUNI fare evasion. The suspect fled and fired upon officers during the chase. Officers returned fire and killed the suspect.
Suspect armed with a pistol fled from officers. A officer shot at the suspect and hit two bystanders. The suspect was arrested.
Two victims were stabbed. One officer shot and killed the suspect. One of the stabbing victims died.
Suspect fled following a traffic stop. The suspect shot at officers, who fired back and killed the suspect.
Suspect drove into a carjacked vehicle into a police car. An officer shot the car, which crashed. The suspect was uninjured.
Officers attempted to interview a suspect in connection to a homicide. The suspect barricaded himself in and fired upon officers. An officer shot and killed the suspect with a rifle.
Officers interrupted a robbery. The suspect drew a pistol; one officer fired at the suspect and missed. The suspect surrendered.
Officers were called to a stabbing. The suspect thrust a boxcutter at officers. An officer shot and killed the suspect.
Suspect fell during a chase, then pointed a pistol at an officer. The officer shot and injured the suspect.
Two suspects fled after being approached by an officer. One turned to the officer "holding an object the officer believed to be a firearm." The officer shot and missed; the suspect escaped.
Suspect pointed a machine-pistol at an officer; another officer shot him twice, injuring him.
Suspect drove a stolen car towards officers; a recruit fired three shots at the vehicle. There were no injuries.
Suspect drove a carjacked vehicle down a dead-end. Officers fired at the car when it attempted a three-point turn, injuring the suspect.
A carjacked taxi drove at police officers. One officer shot at the car; the driver was not struck.
Off-duty officer accidentally shot himself in the leg while repairing his gun.
Suspect held a gun threateningly. When he turned towards officers, an officer shot and injured him. The officer also shot and injured a bystander.
Officers were called to an assault with a machete. The suspect exited the address with a hammer above his head; an officer shot and killed him
A male suspect shot at two men. An officer fired at the suspect and missed. The suspect ran but was apprehended.
Officers responded to a robbery in progress. When a suspect drew a weapon, four officers fired at and injured him.
Suspect accelerated in the direction of an officer; the officer fired one time at the driver. The shot missed. The suspect later crashed the car and was arrested.
Off-duty officer was involved in traffic collision. The other driver assaulted the officer. The officer shot and grazed him. He was then arrested.
Suspect rammed stolen car past vehicles as officers tried to stop him. The suspect accelerated toward an officer. Another officer shot the car; the suspect was not hit and fled.
Suspect steered a vehicle toward an officer. An officer fired at the suspect and missed. An officer was hit by gunfire; the suspect fled and was apprehended later.
Suspect pointed a taser at officers. The officers shot and killed him.

A car rolled over in a collision. When bystanders tried to render aid, they were fired upon from inside the car. The suspect ultimately emerged and pointed a gun at officers; six officers shot and killed him.
Officers observed an auto burglary and followed suspects to their car. A suspect pointed a gun at an officer (who was not in uniform); the officer shot and killed him.
Officers interrupted a drug deal. One suspect pointed a gun at an officer; the officer shot and wounded him.
Suspect attempted to rob an off-duty officer. A struggle ensued; the officer shot and wounded the suspect.
Officers were called to a closed business' tripped alarm. Upon seeing a suspect inside, an officer shot at them and missed.
Suspect broke into Mission Police Station car park. The suspect drew a fake gun from his waistband; two officers shot and killed him.
Suspect assaulted the officer with a kitchen knife. Other officers shot and killed him.
Driver of a stolen vehicle attempted to flee officers, ramming vehicles and driving on the wrong side of the road. Officers shot and killed her.
properties.address: Van Ness Ave. and Pine St.

properties.short_desc: Suspect fled from the scene of a hit-and-run and tried to carjack several vehicles. The suspect "charged" an officer; the officer shot and wounded him.
Suspect assaulted an officer, took his pistol, and pointed it at the officer. Another officer shot and killed him.
Suspect on a "citywide rampage" ramming cars. Officer shot at him and missed on Treasure Island. The suspect was later apprehended.
Suspect took a rifle to the sixth floor of a construction site and was allegedly "looking for potential targets." Three officers shot and killed him.
Suspect of a stabbing was surrounded by officers while holding a knife. The suspect moved towards an officer; five officers shot and killed him.
Homeless Outreach Team members called police. The suspect moved towards officers with a knife; after firing "less-lethal" rounds, officers shot and killed him.
Suspect in a stolen car tried to flee police, "almost striking one of the officers, before heading toward" another. An officer shot and killed him.
An officer was shot. The responding officers exchanged fire with the suspect, killing him.
Suspect was approached due to a reported restraining order violation. He resisted officers and injured one. Another shot the suspect twice, injuring him.
Officers say they saw a suspect stabbing a restaurant employee. The suspect followed the employee, carrying a knife. An officer shot and killed the suspect.
Officers shot and killed an armed suspect holding a woman and child hostage. There were no other injuries.
Two officers interrupted an auto burglary. The suspect shot at both officers; one was injured. The other officer fired back and injured the suspect.
Recruit officer and his training officer chased a suspect regarding a carjacking. The suspect stopped and ran towards the officers' car; the recruit shot and killed the suspect.
Off-duty officer died from a self-inflicted gunshot wound.
Suspect wanted in connection to a homicide fired upon officers from within an RV. Seven officers returned fire. There were no injuries; the suspect was arrested.
properties.address: De Haro St. and Alameda St.

properties.short_desc: Suspect trying to flee after an armed robbery concealed himself in a car trunk. He shot at officers and ten returned fire, killing him.
Officers tried to detain a suspect in a barber shop. The suspect shot and injured an officer; officers returned fire and killed him. Four bystanders were injured.
Suspect fled after potential auto-burglary. The suspect got into a car and collided with vehicles; a recruit officer shot at the car twice. There were no injuries and the suspect was later arrested.
Suspect "acting in a suspicious manner" fled from officers. The suspect took out a handgun; an officer shot him twice and injured him.
Off-duty officer confronted a "subject inside the gated area of a condo complex." The subject tried to hit the officer with a rock; the officer shot and injured him.
Off-duty officer shot at a car after a "traffic altercation." The other car left at high speed.
Suspect hit an officer with a glass bottle; two officers shot and injured him.
Off-duty officer intervened in a carjacking. The suspect attacked the officer with a knife. The officer shot and injured the suspect, who fled in a police car and was late killed by police.
Suspect found trespassing in a building was wielding a "wooden board." Officers discharged their weapons among "multiple uses of force," but the suspect was not struck.
Suspect allegedly connected to a carjacking ran at two officers with a knife. Both officers shot and killed him.
Officers were called to break up a fight between two men. One man held a knife, and did not drop it when asked. Officers shot the suspect with "less-lethal" weapons and with guns; he was injured.
Plainclothes officers followed auto burglary suspects. While attempting to detain a suspect, one officer shot a suspect in the wrist.
properties.address: Jack London Alley and Brannan St.

properties.short_desc: Suspect at a residential hotel ran at officers with a knife. One officer fired "less-lethal" weapons and the other fired their gun. The suspect was killed.
Suspect was armed with a BB gun at SFO airport. The suspect lifted the BB gun towards officers, who shot and killed him.
Police were called to reports of a man being attacked with a knife. Suspect and victim were on the ground when officers opened fire and killed them both.
